en: I knew you could do it!

Welcome to Laser Bounce! 

Press the play button to start.
Pieces with a light grey base can be moved by dragging and dropping.
Pieces with a dark grey base can be rotated by tapping.
Pieces with no base at all can not be moved or rotated.
Pieces with both bases can be moved and rotated.
Mirrors aren't the only thing that can be moved/rotated!
Be careful of the laser's angle.
Absorber activators activate when the correct color laser hits them.
Gate activators activate when the correct color laser passes through them.
Mirror activators activate when the correct color laser bounces off of them.
All activators connected to a piece (such as this door) must be activated in order for the piece to activate.
Activators and goals only activate if the correct color is used.
